TopicTitle: How do I use the turboshaft engines so my craft doesn't go in reverse and and turn?

Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm having this issue where my plane is going in reverse AND veering to the left in circles. Anyone an expert on these parts and help me out?

I'm currently using Restock+ if that helps. 

Version 1.12.5

Edited February 10, 2023 by KolonelKerbal
Question was answered

Your propeller blades are arranged asymmetrically: they are deployed in the same direction, but the motors are spinning in opposite directions, so one set of blades is producing backwards thrust.

Try setting the variant of the propeller blades on the one of the engines to "counterclockwise". (I don't remember which one it should be; try both separately and see which one makes the plane go forwards.)
Also, once you get the thrust in the right direction, you might still find yourself turning to the left.  The answer is, and always will be, "More right rudder!"
